TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Maramud, title = Maramud, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maramud} }

S.FORM: == Takaray a sowal == maramod Maramod han niyam o 'Amis ko nika lacacay no fafa'inai ato fafahi. O tataakay a demak no lalafo no loma' ko nika raramod i niyaro'. Patata ko fal'elohay a maramoday to titi no fafoy ato 'epah a pakaen to lalomaan i loma'. Mapapatakid ato mapapa'icep ko fal'elohay a maramoday. Mitolon ko faki to fal'elohay a maramoday, ato pakalemed i tohnian.

== Takaray a sowal == maramod Maramod han niyam o 'Amis ko nika lacacay no fafa'inai ato fafahi. O tataakay a demak no lalafo no loma' ko nika raramod i niyaro'. Patata ko fal'elohay a maramoday to titi no fafoy ato 'epah a pakaen to lalomaan i loma'. Mapapatakid ato mapapa'icep ko fal'elohay a maramoday. Mitolon ko faki to fal'elohay a maramoday, ato pakalemed i tohnian.
